sentences.en: A display device that uses a cathode ray tube.
sentences.cn: 一种使用阴极射线管的显示装置.

sentences.en: And if I evacuate it, I have a cathode ray tube.
sentences.cn: 如果我对其抽真空，我会得到一根阴极射线管。

sentences.en: Cathode rays are attracted by a positive charge.
sentences.cn: 阴极射线被正电荷所吸引.

sentences.en: Choose anode or cathode electrophoresis according to the electrophoresis process and coating.
sentences.cn: 2根据电泳工艺及涂膜性不同,选择阴极电泳或阳极电泳.

sentences.en: Cold - cathode gages cannot be degassed as easily or as rapidly as hot - filament tubes.
sentences.cn: 冷阴极压力计不能像热丝管那样容易和迅速地排气.

sentences.en: Cold cathode sensing tubes are more rugged than the glass, hot - filament tubes.
sentences.cn: 冷阴极传感管比玻璃热丝管坚实.

sentences.en: In discussing cells, one calls the electrode at which reductions occur the cathode.
sentences.cn: 在所讨论的电池中, 在其上发生还原作用的电极叫做阴极.

sentences.en: Second, they are "activating" some of the inactive components, by freeing lithium from the inactive material so that it can move between the cathode and the anode.
sentences.cn: 其次，他们是“激活”消极的一些组件，通过释放从非活动的材料，以便可以移动它们之间的阴极和阳极锂。

sentences.en: So the left electrode will be the cathode as I have configured it, and the right electrode will be anode.
sentences.cn: 因此左边电极就成了阴极,正如我原来设定的一样，右边的电极就是阳极。

sentences.en: The amount of information that a cathode ray tube screen displays.
sentences.cn: 阴极射线管屏幕所显示的信息总量.

sentences.en: The cathode rays are always beamed on a fresh area of the anode surface.
sentences.cn: 阴极射线总是射向阳极表面的新区域.

sentences.en: The element within a vacuum which is the source of electronics is known as the cathode.
sentences.cn: 真空管中作为电子来源的那个元件,叫做阴极.

sentences.en: The ferroelectric cathode material is a new kind of functional material.
sentences.cn: 作为一种新型功能材料,铁电阴极材料的研究日益受人们重视.

sentences.en: The interior of the tube must be kept a hard vacuum to preserve the photo cathode.
sentences.cn: 显象管内部一定要保证高真空才能保护光电阴极.

sentences.en: The measuring cell consists of an insulated silver cathode.
sentences.cn: 测量电池是由绝缘的银阴极组成的.
这些物质被称为 “ 阴极射线”.

sentences.en: Three dispatchers were scanning cathode ray tube displays for information.
sentences.cn: 三名调度员正在研究阴极射线管所显示的情报.

sentences.en: Water - cooled cold - arc - cathode in cup - shape and tube - shaped anode are used.
sentences.cn: 采用水冷铜环形冷弧阴极和水冷筒 状 阳极.

trans.tran_en: the negative  electrode  , marked (-), from which an electric current leaves a piece of equipment such as a  battery
